digest.recommendations:
🌍 Your Weekly Travel Digest

Based on your previous trips to France and Japan, here are some personalized recommendations:

📍 Recommended Destinations:
1. Italy - Similar cultural richness to France with unique Mediterranean flair
2. South Korea - Perfect next step after Japan, offering modern Asian culture
3. Vietnam - Excellent blend of cultural experiences at a lower price point

✈️ Planning Tips:
• Weather looks favorable (24°C) - perfect for exploring!
• Don't miss the upcoming Local Cultural Festival
• Key safety reminders:
  - Keep document copies handy
  - Stay alert in tourist areas

💰 Budget Insights:
• Consider visiting during shoulder season for better rates
• Look into rail passes for multiple city visits
• Local food markets can help save on dining costs

🌟 Unique Experiences to Consider:
1. Cooking classes in local homes
2. Early morning fish market tours
3. Traditional craft workshops

Pro Tip: Based on your interest in France and Japan, consider focusing on destinations with strong culinary traditions for your next adventure!

Need more specific recommendations? Just let me know! 🌟

intelligence.summary: Pleasant weather expected throughout the week
